Package com.google.appinventor.client.editor.simple.components

Mock components (GWT widgets) used within the Designer to represent the real components that run on the mobile device.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FormChangeListener
    Listener interface for receiving form change events.
    MockSprite
    Marker interface for sprites
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MockBall
    Mock Ball component.
    MockButton
    Mock Button component.
    MockCanvas
    Mock Canvas component.
    MockCheckBox
    Mock CheckBox component.
    MockComponent
    Abstract superclass for all components in the visual designer.
    MockComponentsUtil
    Helper methods for working with mock components.
    MockContactPicker
    Mock ContactPicker component.
    MockContainer
    Abstract superclass for all container mock components.
    MockEmailPicker
    Mock EmailPicker component.
    MockForm
    Mock Form component.
    MockFormHelper
    Helper class for MockForm to get around a restriction in the Java compiler on calling super

    Mock HorizontalArrangement component.

    Superclass for HVArrangement based mock components
    MockHVArrangementHelper
    Helper class for MockHVArrangement to get around a restriction in the Java compiler on calling super

Package com.google.appinventor.client.editor.simple.components Description

Mock components (GWT widgets) used within the Designer to represent the real components that run on the mobile device. Every concrete component has a corresponding mock component in this package.
